verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom newline Where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom newline There is peace, there is love, there is joy newline It is for freedom you've set us free newline It is for freedom you've set us free

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: So we will walk in your freedom, walk in your liberty newline So we will walk in your freedom, walk in your liberty newline So we will dance in your freedom, dance in your liberty newline So we will dance in your freedom, dance in your liberty
